Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations

Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.assoc

package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.annotations.assoc
The package contains loaders for content of several useful files.

The HpoAssociationLoader is the top-level loader that returns HpoAssociationData. To provide HpoAssociationData, HpoAssociationLoader uses sub-loaders:

  • HumanGeneInfoLoader to load GeneIdentifiers
  • DiseaseToGeneAssociationLoader to load associations between genes and diseases, and
  • HpoDiseaseLoader to create HpoDisease with disease model definitions.

  • Class
    Description
    DiseaseToGeneAssociationLoader
    This class parses files containing gene to disease associations: Homo_sapiens.gene_info.gz (has links between NCBIGene ids and gene symbols) mim2gene_medgen (has links between OMIM disease ids and genes/NCBIGene ids Optionally, Orphanet's gene file, en_product6.xml (has links between Orphanet diseases and genes)
    GeneIdentifierLoader
    An interface for loading GeneIdentifiers from various sources.
    GeneIdentifierLoaders
    Loaders for getting GeneIdentifiers from different file formats.
    GeneInfoGeneType
    Gene types corresponding to values found in the 10th column of the Homo sapiens gene info file that is parsed by HumanGeneInfoLoader.
    HpoAssociationLoader
    Top-level loader for creating HpoAssociationData.
    Mim2GeneMedgenLoader
    Parse mim2gene_medgen, which is available at https://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/gene/DATA/mim2gene_medgen into DiseaseToGeneAssociations container.
    MissingPhenolResourceException
     
    OrphaGeneToDiseaseParser
    This class parses the Orphanet file that contains the disease to gene associations (en_product6.xml).
